Package com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.pixel

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BrightnessPixelTransform
    Modifies the brightness (luminosity) of each affected pixel by adding/subtracting a delta value to each color channel of an affected pixel.
    InvertPixelTransform
    Inverts the color value of each affected pixel.
    RemoveAlphaPixelTransform
    Saturates the alpha channel of any pixel that is not fully transparent or fully opaque (has no effect on fully opaque or fully transparent pixels).
    TransparencyPixelTransform
    Adjusts the level of transparency (alpha) in each affected pixel.
